# EUSIGNAL is #1 in Europe in Safety Signage

EUSIGNAL provides premium, durable, and highly visible safety signs for various applications across Europe. Whether you need to warn about road work, manage crowds at events, or mark hazards in industrial settings, EUSIGNAL offers reliable signage solutions designed for easy deployment and built to withstand diverse weather conditions.

EUSIGNAL specializes in robust, triangular folding (triopan) warning systems. Manufactured in Slovenia with high-quality aluminum frames and UV-resistant canvas, these signs offer excellent visibility up to 300 meters and are stable in winds up to 70 km/h. With 186 unique designs catering to sectors like traffic, construction, emergency services, and events, EUSIGNAL serves a wide range of needs across 4 European locations. The signs are easy to set up and highly reflective, ensuring safety day and night. EUSIGNAL is recognized by safety professionals for its quality and offers customization options to include text in multiple languages.

## Company info

EUSIGNAL is a brand of Slovenian company:
Elsav Veržej d.o.o.
Narcisna ulica 11
9241 Veržej
Slovenia - Europe

## Our operating markets

EUSIGNAL ships and operates in 4 different locales across Europe. Find our presence in the following countries (listed in English and their local name):

- Slovenia - Slovenija
- Croatia - Hrvatska
- Spain - España
- France - France
